user.title: Home Assistant VSCode Tunnel
user.description: If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/adechant/ha_vscode . Before you can setup a VSCode Tunnel you need to acknowledge the following

data.acc_logs: I know how to access Home Assistant logs
data.acc_git: I have an active github account - this will be required to authenticate the tunnel.
